replies.body:
you were a really nice guy to me. It was fun to talk to you. But recently u started to behave like a 6 year old kid.  You Always call yourself 'g0d'. Idk I still enjoy talking to you but you became so annoying. I hope its temporary.

Apollo is a strong team, roster is really good but we should be more active. 

9.5/10

I like your team, you have good players but I don't like the way you guys play in scrims. I feel like you guys don't focus the game at all. But since I'm not in your team, I can't really know. These are just what I th覺ink.

your honest opinions on me?

Holden or me?

Would you go for Junior Mod?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
I've never really spoken to you but you are pretty chill. I can say that you are funny as well. You are a nice mod.

umm Holden :p actually depends on why you ask

My situation in turkey is fine for now. Governemt is pretty bad but doesn't affect my life a lot. I wish I could change some things but can't. I'm thinking of moving abroad as soon as possible but I'm not old enough to move by myself so this is sad. There are so many shit things here but except terror attacks it doesn't affect me at all.

Not really. Firstly, I don't think I could be a good mod. Secondly, minecraft is something I do for fun. I would not want to take responsibilities over it since it's getting boring and I'm loosing interest on it.
